content: this versatile hat pattern includes instructions for two lengths one reaching the base of the ear and one mid-ear perfect for adapting to different seasons living in ontario i prefer full ear coverage for winter but a mid-ear length for warmer weather i thought you d appreciate the flexibility too the pattern is worked in continuous rounds no slip_stitch joins or chains resulting in a seamless neat finish however you can opt to use slip stitches and chain-1 joins if you prefer just keep the slip stitches small to minimize the seam for cotton yarn like bernat handicrafter cotton check out my basic half_double_crochet hat pattern for medium weight cotton 1 ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ threads https //www threads net/@oombawkadesigncrochet newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/free-half-double-crochet-beanie-hat/
